Container.Name: mavv-demobot
Container.Overview: MAVV Demobot 2.9 â€” Discord Game Night Voting Bot. Manages weekly game voting, nominations, attendance, and result publishing for your gaming group.

Variable.Name: VOTE_CHANNEL_ID
Variable.Description: Channel ID for voting announcements and results

Variable.Name: ADMIN_USER_IDS
Variable.Description: Comma-separated Discord user IDs for bot admins

Variable.Name: VOTE_OPEN_DAY
Variable.Description: Day of week to open voting

Variable.Name: VOTE_OPEN_TIME
Variable.Description: Time to open voting (HH:MM in configured timezone)

Variable.Name: RESULTS_DAY
Variable.Description: Day of week to publish results

Variable.Name: RESULTS_TIME
Variable.Description: Time to publish results (HH:MM in configured timezone)

Variable.Name: REMINDER_DAY
Variable.Description: Day of week to send reminder DMs

Variable.Name: REMINDER_TIME
Variable.Description: Time to send reminders (HH:MM in configured timezone)

Variable.Name: ATTENDANCE_CUTOFF_DAY
Variable.Description: Day of week after which attendance changes are locked

Variable.Name: ATTENDANCE_CUTOFF_TIME
Variable.Description: Time after which attendance changes are locked (HH:MM in configured timezone)

Variable.Name: TIMEZONE
Variable.Description: IANA timezone for all scheduled events

Variable.Name: RUNOFF_DEADLINE_DAY
Variable.Description: Day of week when runoff voting closes (e.g. monday = before game night)

Variable.Name: RUNOFF_DEADLINE_TIME
Variable.Description: Time when runoff voting closes (HH:MM in configured timezone)

Variable.Name: MAX_NOMINATIONS_PER_PERSON
Variable.Description: Max game nominations per person per week

Variable.Name: MAX_TOTAL_GAMES
Variable.Description: Max games on the ballot per week

Variable.Name: CARRY_OVER_COUNT
Variable.Description: Number of top games that carry over each week
